description: I am gay. But I am into straight boys. It is a big turn-on for me to see them do things that they normally wouldn‘t even think about. Our General made an appointment today in a small city close to Prague. And it seems like he has some sort of special luck that all of his „clients“ live in those communist-buildings. But when he saw the guy he realized that he was never ever straight. But he still had to find out. Nothing more easy than that. The boy was quite desperate. His debts already mounted up so it was a rather easy catch for my friend. He started with some humiliating games right from the beginning. A carrot served as a penis to investigate the boy‘s sucking talent. He claimed to be only bi. Well, let‘s see...
title: Debt Dandy 05
